data.features: Data presentation using data from json file, dynamic filtering over data, tags
data.description: I made this page using design from Fontend mentor. Site features listing job offers by tags with usage of json markdown, React and Tailwind.
data.title: Job listings with filtering solution

text.html:
The challenge

Users should be able to:

  • Filter over interactive elements: Role and position
  • Remove filters
  • See hover states for all interactive elements on the page

Project elements:

  • dynamic filtering over list of jobs
  • every job offer has: data about recruiting company, position, role, level, contract, location, coding language, required tools and corresponding logo 
  • languages and tools acts as filters 

What i learned:

How to dynamically change background pictures when switching from mobile to desktop view.

function App() {
  const [windowWidth, setWindowWidth] = useState(window.innerWidth);
  const imageUrl = windowWidth <= 650 ? mobileImage : desktopImage;
  
useEffect(() => {
    const handleWindowResize = () => {
        setWindowWidth(window.innerWidth);
    };
    
    window.addEventListener('resize', handleWindowResize);

    return () => {
        window.removeEventListener('resize', handleWindowResize);
    }
}, []);
}
    <div className="App ">
      <header className="bg-teal-600 w-screen ">
        <img className="w-screen h-52 sm:w-screen" 
        src={imageUrl} alt="header img" />
      </header>
